item.title: About Me
item.description: DevOps Engineer with experience in cloud-native environments and automation. My studies took place at the Department of Telecommunications and Media Informatics at the Budapest University of Technology and Economics. I’m interested in cloud technologies, distributed systems, web3, and decentralized finance. I have a good understanding of cryptocurrency markets and foreign exchange. I’ve spent most of my professional career working in a cloud environment, specializing in CI/CD pipelines, automation, orchestration and infrastructure as code solutions.
